column1: ALC lane change message and animation optimization
LCC unavailable pop-up message blocking the screen

LCC co-driving: after the vehicle enters the adjacent lane, it still pulls back to the original lane.  The lane marking (display in DIM) becomes broken and displayed as jagged polylines instead of a smooth continuous line
When LDP is triggered, there are lots of steering wheel jerks
RMF: after hands are off for 2 seconds, the vehicle starts gliding forward, hazard lights do not flash, no braking
LCC: when there is no truck, “truck avoidance” message appears
Low-speed resume: no pop-up message - Unable to activate LCC Low speed
